posts.post_content:
This card is so average it makes me want to take all my cards and SNUGGLE with them  
SNUGGLE SNUGGLE SNUGGLE  
  
It works well with [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun) and obviously, [Overwhelming Stampede](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overwhelming Stampede), and is a good draftable card, like [Greater Basilisk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Greater Basilisk)  
  
Please don't judge me, but this is also a decent card on the XBOX Live Arcade MTG game, for it's overall averageness.   
Yes, i do play it on my Xbox. Shut up.

posts.post_content:
Even thought my first Deck was this blue-sceada-thingy from 8th Edition, this worm was my favorite card in the awesome "how to play magic" cd from 9th core set.   
  
I always picked green, because of this 5\4 body-power.   
Black had some kind of Bug (4\2) and the other colors just 3\3 creatures, so in fact: The computer wasn't able to defeat my monster. muhahaha.
posts.html:
